reviews.review: Игра старая, но несмотря на это очень атмосферная
Classic FPS game that helped shape the genre and remains fun to this day. Great modding community as well, with hundreds of great quality mods and new ones still coming out today.
Это игра богов!

Despite being released about two decades ago, the gameplay, story, and environments still hold up to this day. The gameplay feels smooth and satisfying, the environments are interesting and can tell the story just by itself, and the story makes sense and was quite revolutionary for the time, while still being a great story. Of course, it does have the bugs and graphics of a game released 20 years ago, but I still think its not only a great game, but it was extremely important for defining modern PC games. If you haven't played it before, I highly recommend it.

but seriously, impactful, fun, occasionally dicky, first person narrative shooter. the original, the most impactful, aside from doom obviously. maybe sometimes i would rather play a more involving or intriguing or original shooter, but its one of the better historically impactful shooters out there. also considering theres an army of devs still fixing little bugs in it to this day, and it runs almost flawlessly on any computer you care to try and run it on, id say this is a mustplay.

Бессмертная классика, оказавшая неоценимое влияние на игровую индустрию. Единственное к чему можно придраться так это к слабо раскрытому сюжету. Это же, впрочем прослеживается и в первом Portal. А в остальном в игре прекрасно всё: оружие, геймплей, проработка мира и врагов и прочее. 10 монтировок из 10!

Cuando se estreno "Doom" muchos han querido copiar el mismo metodo de simplemente disparar a lo loco, pero los desarrolladores de Valve hicieron algo mas que solamente disparar mounstruos, tenian que contarte una historia poco a poco,   interactuar con NPC que te podrian ayudar en tu travesia, Valvulas y botones para continuar tu aventura.
Estas obligado a jugarlo si tienes una PC, no importa si tu pc es una basura, C U A L Q U I E R  pc que pueda prender, puede correr este juego.

Worth buying on sale. It's like a cents but much worth to buy it on Half-Life bundle or Valve Complete Pack.
The gameplay was bit hard for new players like me but the story is good and the length of this game is around 10-13 hours.
And has a smooth movement which the Gold source engine made the game look good. The multiplayer is like Quake but it's Half-Life, Doesn't seem to be more cheaters/griefers and has okay-ish servers.
Definitely worth if you're into stories.

game

After 20 years  of the intial release, I finally got to play this game. Before I get started on this review I would like to let you know that  I played the HL2 first. So, after I started this game I became excited. The graphics in this game was not why I loved this game, but the story in this master piece was phenominal. From, the start you are being transported through the Black Mesa facility to help with this project they have been working on. Till everything goes downhill. Aliens began invading the facility. The scientists waited for help from the government. Instead the government start killing everything on site. So, it was up to you (Gordon Freeman) to destroy the Alien hive and there leader. The gameplay kept me going and being very open about the environment I was in. There were some neat puzzles too. And there is this mysterious man that practically stalks you throughout the game was... Never mind it might be my imagination. In all I rate this 10/10. -

Olha, eu joguei muito mais o HL 2 ao invés do 1, tanto que a analise do 2 ja ta aqui no meu perfil a anos e inclusive muita gente gosta kkk, mas agora tomei vergonha na cara pra fazer a analise do MASTERPIECE primeiro Half-Life...

O jogo é de 1998, desenvolvido por pessoas dedicadas e nerds, e não necessáriamente designers de jogos, e mesmo assim, até hoje, em pleno 2018, o jogo continua sensacional apresentando uma das melhores fisicas ja vistas na era dos games. Gráficos bons pra época e a interação com os personagens é complexa no sentido de muitas variações, e fácil e dinâmica ao mesmo tempo kk, o jogo é longo pra caramba, divertido, com elementos e Sci-Fi, horror e personagens carismáticos!

O personagem principal, Gordon Freeman, é um badass da porra e nem sequer diz uma palavra durante o gameplay! A trama, os plot twists, os inimigos e mistérios apresentados aos jogadores, tudo é conduzido de maneira majestosa! A dificuldade é sempre moderada e os desafios conforme vamos avançando a aventura aumentam de maneira realmente hostil, passando de catástrofes científicas e "acidentes" de trabalho pra invasões de monstros assassinos e soldados armados até os dentes.

A trama é bem explicada com o passar do jogo, então pode ficar sossegado caso esteja meio confuso... eu realmente me empolgo falando sobre jogos bons, hehe. Como o jogo geralmente encontra-se barato na steam, eu recomendo que compre... e depois compre o 2, e depois os jogos da série Portal, que se passam no mesmo universo!

Prós:

- Leve
- Divertido, longo e com dificulade sempre moderada
- Trama incrível e bem conduzida
- Muitas possibilidades de interações
- Variedade imensa de inimigos
- Variedade imensa e criativa de armas
- Um prato cheio pra quem curte terror sci-fi tipo Alien ou The Thing
- Pouquíssimos bugs
- Comunidade que curte o jogo só tem gente boa!
- Jogando HL vc conhece os primórdios da Valve
- Mistérios a serem solucionados, como G-Man

Contras:

- Não tem cartas colecionáveis e nem achievements

BÔNUS: É graças a Half-Life que Counter-Strike, seu jogo modinha de FPS, existe =D

10/10 MUST PLAY

At first I did not like this game I found it boring and I just wanted to write it off as another badly aged shitty game, but I played more and I soon started really liking it. The story is really interesting and it keeps me invested, and as for the gameplay, it was the best part of the game. The game is difficult and I like difficult games, so that was a plus for me.

Para ser un juego clásico, es muy desesperante en término de velocidad de movimientos, su tipo de audio te causa dolores de cabeza recomiendo usar altavoces mis respetos quien pueda ser capaz de pasar el juego con además de estos percances negativos, entre otros más, fuera de eso el juego contiene buen contenido, En conclusión, evita jugar periodos largos de tiempo este juego dado que te provoca como consecuencia un fuerte de dolor de cabeza.

iT'S AMAZING. Definitely revolutionary for 1998, gameplay hasn't aged even a bit, still smooth 20 years later.

Multiplayer:

"Time to choose Mrs. Freeman..." Com certeza esse jogo merece a sua atenção. Com um jogo inteiro sem "cutscenes" e apenas na perpectiva de Gordon Freeman, Half-Life 1, não é apenas mais um jogo de "FPS", é sim uma aventura épica com as idéias mais loucas que podemos pensar. Um experimento da errado e sua aventura começa, atravessando vários lugares da base "Black Mesa", sendo caçado por exército, tanto militar quanto alienigena, você precisa sobreviver. No caminho você encontra aliados cientistas que ajudam-lhe e dão sequência na trama, até chegar no confronto final. Não darei nenhum "spoiler", mas é claro que se você já o conhece não preciso dizer muito aqui, mas se você nunca jogou, compre e jogue, não terá arrependimento!

If your buying this game to play it co-op through Sven Co-op... DON'T

Overwelminglyt Positive...? This game is absolute garbage... like WTF? Super uninteresrting, extremely RANDOM, and super confusing. My brothers and I just finished binging this game through Sven co-op for 9 hours and WOW was it a resouinding disappointment and bore. Even co-op can't make this game enjoyable. The only thing good that game from HL1 is Cry of Fear. Literally 100x better than this game!!! I only spent like $2.97 to purchase x3 copies of this game, and now I know why it goes on sale for $0.99. I wouldn't even recommend dowloading this game for free. (Cry of Fear's co-op campaign is FREE... yeah its pretty buggy, but  its extremely fun, especially in comparison to this)

(BTW I did play this game for 9h through Sven co-op...  but yeah you need to play the game for at least 5min to write a review. So i just rode the stupid train in the begining, and yes it take 6 minutes for no apparent reason.)

EDIT:
I removed the comment about it being too long. It's not a long game, it only takes 12 hours on average according to HLTB. I just think its awful... so 12 hours of awfulness is a whole lot of awfulness.

I also removed the comment about it being super unfair. I only played it through Sven Co-op, so IDK about balancing.

Half Life is probably one of the best games from 1998. I played both the retail and steam version, and this pretty much is somewhat buchered. Of course they added things for next gen compatability but it's not bad, it's just missing things.

Story : The story follows Gordon Freeman, a scientist that works with the Black Mesa institute as he goes to work in a test chamber to harness the power of Xen Crystals. The story follows the aftermath as Gordon has to move level to level in the facility to escape. - Story gets 8/10 for the plot, although it feels very basic. You learn more overtime though, which is a nice touch, and was one the earliest games to introduce story-telling with action and did it well.

Gameplay : The gameplay is pretty good. It's a FPS, and controls and responds well with a challenge. You have platforming and puzzle solving as well, along with a long range of 12 weapons to work with that all are pretty unique. NPC's are a thing with Scientists and Barneys, but they have a HORRIBLE AI, where they walk into walls and bump into things, which is the big issue. - 9/10. 

Graphics : The graphics are pretty standard. It's a nice asthetic throwback to the 90s with it's low-poly style, and aged well. Although there is an option for High-quality HD models from the Xbox port of the game (I think it's from this, I can't remember.), but I prefer the original. The problem though is that the HD models affect hitboxes such as headshots and certain bodyshots are a no-go. - 8/10.

Replayablity : Replayablity is varied. You have some stuff you could go back to, such as Multiplayer but not much else, such as Deathmatch or whatever. - 6/10. 

Overall : I would rate it a 8/10. I would reccomend this for next-gen PCs, but the original retail is a version you would like. It has things that were removed and has a weird resolution, but it's better then this version. Although this is a great port, and it get's a 10/10, it's a classic that will never be forgotten.

"Good morning, Gordon.."
Half Life é o primeiro jogo da aclamada série criada pela Valve, com sua engine revolucionária e sua história envolvente, é até hoje amado por muitos jogadores.
Os eventos de HL se ambientam numa instalação de pesquisas norte americana ultrasecreta, possivelmente instalada no Novo México, tendo como foco o desenvolvimento de tecnologia militar de ponta e o teletransporte interdimensional. Gordon Freeman, o protagonista, é apenas mais um dos empregados graduados no MIT que trabalha na poderosa Black Mesa Research Facility, mal sabia ele que o futuro da humanidade, daquele dia em diante, estaria em suas mãos. Chegando atrasado para o trabalho, Gordon é prontamente equipado com sua HEV, um ícone da série, e colocado na câmara de testes. Pórem algo dá profundamente errado e, numa Resonance Cascade, vários aliens do mundo de borda Xen são teleportados para  a Terra, atacando a instalação. Gordon, munido com seu pé de cabra e a proteção de sua suit, parte em busca de socorro para seus companheiros, sendo encaminhado para enfrentar uma entidade misteriosa, e por um fim na invasão. 
Vamos às qualidades do game:
Para a época (1998) Half Life revolucionava em muitos aspectos, com uma engine nova (a Gold Source), baseada na engine do Quake, apresentava uma dinâmica de gameplay inovadora e única, sendo apontado como revolucionário até os dias atuais. Um aspecto realmente 3D, uma jogatina envolvente, uma física exemplar e efeitos de som ótimos, juntamente com um cenário totalmente dinâmico, deram o lugar de destaque que esse jogo merece.

Um dos melhores jogos que joguei na minha vida , zerei umas 3000 vezes e nao me canso , mesmo sendo de 1994 parece um jogo atual no estilo jogabilidade e o quando esta a frente de seu tempo , super recomendo para todos que estao na plataforma da valve.
Nota:Gordon Freeman/10
